definition: festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: The bare energy-saving light bulbs hanging from the ceiling in her living room will not get fixtures soon.
sentences.chinese: 臥室天花板上的球形節能燈可能很快就要被卸下來了。

sentences.english: The invention provides an electronic light modulator for an energy-saving lamp.
sentences.chinese: 本發明提供了一種用於節能燈的電子調光器。

sentences.english: The present invention provides a tube-bending device of energy-saving lamp tube helical tube-bending machine.
sentences.chinese: 本發明提供了一種節能燈管螺旋彎管機的彎管裝置。

sentences.english: Premature failure of the usually long-life, low-energy light sources may also be occurring.
sentences.chinese: 使用壽命短，節能燈的光源會經常引起事故。

sentences.english: Can the new energy bulbs keep you awake?
sentences.chinese: 這種新的節能燈會讓你一直醒着嗎？

sentences.english: So, keep installing those energy-efficient light bulbs.
sentences.chinese: 因此，讓我們繼續安裝那些節能燈泡吧。

sentences.english: A good case in point is energy-saving lamps.
sentences.chinese: 一個好的例子就是節能燈。

sentences.english: Switch to energy-efficient light bulbs in your house to reduce the effects of global warming.
sentences.chinese: 爲減少地球溫室效應，在房內安裝節能燈。

sentences.english: Bulb use energy-saving lamps, less air conditioning, everyone will give more than street sprinkler.
sentences.chinese: 燈泡儘量用節能燈，少開空調，大家要給街道多灑水。

sentences.english: And besides, we should not replace a filament bulb with a low-energy one and be done with it .
sentences.chinese: 再者，我們不能認爲就是把節能燈換上就萬事大吉了。

definition: a device used to check money and detect counterfeit bills
to bore/to burrow/to crawl through a tunnel
